attributes.action: Fireworks to be only sold a day before bonfire night.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do this because, it shows that they care about animals and their welfare.
attributes.background: Ban fireworks to the public unless they are for a specific event like bonfire night and new years eve because animals are petrified and its not right to randomly buy fireworks just because people are bored.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for action on this matter: 

Licence the sale of Class F3 and above fireworks & only allow sales at set times
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733895
